---
title: "Data apps from the JHU DSL"
---

This is a gallery of apps created in collaboration with the Johns Hopkins Data Science Lab. 


### papr

![](images/papr.png)

* __What is it?__ In Silicon-Valley speak [papr](https://jhubiostatistics.shinyapps.io/papr/) is "Tindr for preprints". It shows the user a random pre-print off of [biorxiv](http://biorxiv.org/) and lets them rate it for correctness and for interest with a gesture.
* __Who wrote it?__ Lucy D'Agostino McGowan, Nicholas Strayer, and Jeff Leek

-----------



### recount

![](images/recount.png)

* __What is it?__ [recount](https://jhubiostatistics.shinyapps.io/recount/) is a database of analysis-ready RNA-seq data sets processed from a public database. Users can download them as .csv files or as processed R objects. 
* __Who wrote it?__ Leonardo collado Torres
